about_the_game:
"Last Command" takes inspiration from the classic game "Snake,"
Player switch between “Snake” mode and “Barrage” mode to complete all different stages.
Follow the journey and discover the secrets of this program world.

The story in Last Command Demo will be different from the actual game.
In demo, player will face 2 Iron Knights and challenge them.
Switch between 2 modes with various module combinations to win the fight!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: Intel or AMD Dual Core at 2 GHz
  • Graphics: Geforce 9600 GS, Radeon HD 5670
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
